hero.title: Deliver instant AI-powered voice experiences
hero.subtitle: Nouf is an AI Voice Agent that lets your users order, ask, or interact using natural conversation.

1.title: Press the Mic
1.desc: Simply tap the microphone button to start your voice search instantly.

2.title: Say What You're Looking For
2.desc: Speak naturally — whether it's a product name, category, or description.

5.title: Refine with Simple Questions
5.desc: Answer a few quick questions if you want to specify color, size, or price.

6.title: Choose & Buy
6.desc: Select the best product and add it to your cart effortlessly.

items.title: Higher Conversion Rates
items.description: When customers find products faster through voice, they complete purchases more often — boosting your overall sales.

items.title: Faster Product Discovery
items.description: Nouf helps users reach the right product in seconds, reducing drop-offs caused by long searches or complicated filters.

items.title: Better User Experience
items.description: Voice search makes shopping smoother, more intuitive, more accessible — especially for users who struggle with typing or don't know product names.

items.title: Plug-Play Integration
items.description: Add Nouf to your store with a simple script. No technical setup, no development time — just plug it in and start using it.

items.title: Smart Insights
items.description: Gain valuable data about what users are asking for, popular voice queries, and customer intent — helping you improve products and increase store efficiency.

plug.title: Plug-and-Play API
plug.desc: Integrate Nouf in minutes, no complex setup. Works seamlessly with web and mobile apps instantly.

speech.title: Accurate Speech Recognition
speech.desc: Understands Arabic & English clearly for every customer.

intent.title: Intent-Based AI
intent.desc: Recognizes what users mean, not just the words they say.

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.desc: Protects user data with full encryption and compliance.

custom.title: Easy Customization
custom.desc: Flexible configuration options with fast integration.

scale.title: Scalable & Reliable
scale.desc: Track interactions, engagement, and conversations easily.
